entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Joliette
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with freezing rain late this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 9:08 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:08 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
